summary: Pure JS client needs a gRPC interceptor that adds a `temporal-namespace` header to all requests when a namespace field is present in the request object. This feature also requires adding a CI test for cloud integration.
userImpact: Users of the pure JS client will have proper namespace header propagation on all requests, enabling correct namespace handling in cloud environments.
proposedFix: Implement a gRPC interceptor that extracts the namespace field from request objects and sets the temporal-namespace header accordingly. Add CI test for cloud workflows.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented with gRPC interceptor and cloud CI test added
keyQuote: Pure JS client needs to have a gRPC interceptor that takes the `namespace` field out of the request object if present and set the `temporal-namespace` header
